titles.title: Research and Development Tax Credit Extension Act of 2011
Research and Development Tax Credit Extension Act of 2011
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make the research credit permanent and to increase the alternative simplified research credit.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Research and Development Tax Credit Extension Act of 2011 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) make permanent the tax credit for increasing research activities, and (2) increase the rate of the alternative simplified research tax credit.
